name: Mammut 9.5 Crag Dry Rope
description:
The soft hand and thin diameter of this rope makes it suited to onsight attempts, redpoints and superlight alpine tours. For extended top-roping sessions you may want to choose a thicker, workhorse rope.Dry treatment on both sheath and core protects against water and dirt.Coated yarns allow individual fibres to glide over each other, reducing internal friction and fully utilizing each yarn when loaded, for extra durability.Comes lap-coiled by the factory, so ready to climb.High sheath percentage increases durability.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
